did.unittitle: Event inventations, program schedules, and condolence cards,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous events to which Altrusa members were invited, such as a holiday parties or (non-Altrusan) club meetings; generally placed here due to lack of identification. Also contains greeting cards in response to a birth, a member's death, and the marriage of a member's child (presumably).
